attributes.review: This app was such a disappointment minding it being a lot of discouraging news. I can’t comprehend the amount of time people use on this app for how slow it is. I can’t use this seriously as I feel everyone is let as I was.
attributes.title: This is disappointment

attributes.review: When I first logged on I was disgusted to see a hot Cheeto with a yellow wig which appears to be falling off. I was also upset about the fact that they asked for my LOCATION which is giving me stalker vibes as well as the fact that they asked for my phone number. This app is also not for children mostly because of the fact that my 6-year old sisters started to scream and cry for our parents as soon as they opened it when they took my phone to play games. Now they refuse to talk to to me until I deleted this app and even when I did it continued to give me notifications about this orange of a man running for president. I would not even give this horrid app to my worst enemy. He is racist, homophobic, sexist, a rapist and if I really wanted to I could write a whole book about why this man should be out of the office and in jail.
attributes.title: Why Trump should be in jail

attributes.review: this app scammed me so bad for no freaking reason I lost my job & money because of some dumb stuff ugh then they killed my cat & took my car
attributes.title: GEN-Z .

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to see if the rumors were true about the Obama’s hacking and sadly rumors not true 😔 but i will be checking back in to see if they do later 😁

attributes.review: The app crashes your phone immediately then spends the next four years trying to convince you via email that your phone still works. Devs should definitely take it down.
